name: CMMotionActivity
desc: The data for a single motion update event.

items.name: var stationary: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the device is stationary.

items.name: var walking: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the device is on a walking person.

items.name: var running: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the device is on a running person.

items.name: var automotive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the device is in an automobile.

items.name: var cycling: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the device is in a bicycle.

items.name: var unknown: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the type of motion is unknown.

items.name: var startDate: Date
items.desc: The time at which the change in motion occurred.

items.name: var confidence: CMMotionActivityConfidence
items.desc: The confidence in the assessment of the motion type.

items.name: enum CMMotionActivityConfidence
items.desc: The confidence that the motion data is accurate.
